mapper.select: select DISTINCT s.sNUM sNum, s.sTITLE sTitle, s.sPEOPLENUM sPeoplenum, s.sPW sPw, s.sDATE sDate, s.sCATEGORY sCategory, s.mID mId, s.sCOMMENT sComment from STUDYROOM s left join FAVORITES f on s.sNum = f.sNum where f.mId ='jd222' union select DISTINCT s.sNUM sNum, s.sTITLE sTitle, s.sPEOPLENUM sPeoplenum, s.sPW sPw, s.sDATE sDate, s.sCATEGORY sCategory, s.mID mId, s.sCOMMENT sComment from STUDYROOM s right join FAVORITES f on s.sNum = f.sNum where f.mId ='jd222'
